name: Space Kitty
description:
Space Kitty

hello space kitty is a game you zap dogliens with your hightech futuristic flashlight on your phone or other light emitting device you can play this game with your friends so that you can save the space kitty together but also rack up high point

point the light emitting device at your webcam ok

instructions in folder

Good: Bad:

hello this game requires a computer machine with a screen, webcame, and light emitting devices

space kitty was made by karina and alex
